title: Local-currency crunch threatens Africa’s energy ambitions, AIF experts warn
description:
AfDB Energy Financial Solutions, Policy and Regulation director Wale Shonibare.

Local currency financing has emerged as the most pressing obstacle to scaling Africa’s energy ambitions, with ministers and development financiers warning that foreign-currency debt is exposing utilities, projects, and ...

title: Gambia Bankers Association celebrates 23 years of growth as sector posts record gains
description:
The Gambia’s banking industry on Saturday staged one of its most significant gatherings in recent history as the Gambia Bankers Association hosted its 6th Annual Bankers Dinner and Awards Night at the Sir Dawda Kairaba Jawara International Conference Center.

title: Govt approves 0.85 MT of broken rice to Senegal, Indonesia, Mali and Gambia
description:
The government has approved exports of 0.85 million tonne (MT) of broken rice to Senegal, Indonesia, Mali and Gambia since the beginning of the current fiscal, an official with Directorate General of Foreign Trade said on Friday.

While 0.5 MT of broken rice was approved for shipment to Senegal, the...

title: Kalp Foundation, Ministry of Communication and Digital Economy of The Gambia forge partnership
description:
Kalp Foundation, Ministry of Communication and Digital Economy of The Gambia forge partnership
